name: OctopusBuildInformation
friendlyName: Push Package Build Information to Octopus
description: Collect information related to the build, including work items from commit messages, and push to your Octopus Deploy Server.
author: Octopus Deploy

inputs.name: Space
inputs.label: Space
inputs.helpMarkDown: The space within Octopus. This must be the name of the space, not the id.

inputs.name: PackageIds
inputs.label: Package IDs
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Newline-separated package IDs; e.g.
MyCompany.MyApp
MyCompany.MyApp2

inputs.name: PackageVersion
inputs.label: Package Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the package; must be a valid [SemVer](http://semver.org/) version.

inputs.name: Replace
inputs.label: Overwrite Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Normally, if the same package build information already exists on the server, the server will reject the package build information push. This is a good practice as it ensures build information isn't accidentally overwritten or ignored. Use this setting to override this behavior.

instanceNameFormat: Push Package Build Information to Octopus
